General.Name: Alaska Hydro Corporation
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Alaska Hydro Corporation engages in the development of renewable energy projects. It primarily focuses on hydroelectric power generation for resource development. The company is involved in the development of the More Creek hydroelectric project with a generation capacity of approximately 306 gigawatt hours of energy per year located in northwest British Columbia. Alaska Hydro Corporation is headquartered in North Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 2633 Carnation Street, North Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7H 1H6

0.Name: Mr. Clifford Alan Grandison
0.Title: Co-Chairman, Interim Pres, Interim CEO & Sec.
